text: avanti provides a robust set of tools
for helpdesk professionals to automate
and do their job as quickly and
effectively as possible we're evaluating
the proof of concept of migrating or
modernizing our relational data store
from sequel server to Aurora the most
important thing to us or will the really
driving force behind it is the
flexibility and licensing and the the
ability to to consume it it or to use it
in a consumption model where we can you
don't have to license it we just use
what we need whereas with sequel server
there's there are quite a few impediment
surround how many cores are needed are
we allowed to virtualize it what what
environments can it be run in and it's
very cumbersome budgeting around that
becomes very complex when you're trying
to scale or rapidly grow a SAS
application the goal is to introduce a
modern relational data store that allows
us to scale at will as our customers on
board so as Avanti becomes a modern
cutting-edge cloud company we're relying
very heavily on AWS and leveraging the
modern cloud technologies to create a
customer journey that provides the best
set of tools possible to to our
customers as quickly and as effectively
as possible
